entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 except minus 5 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12 except minus 5 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
